description: The Tata Nexon XZ+ Dark Edition is a feature-packed compact SUV with a bold dark theme. Powered by a 1.2L turbo petrol engine producing 120 HP, it offers an engaging driving experience with its AMT gearbox. Safety highlights include 5-star GNCAP rating, 6 airbags, and ESP.

The Tata Nexon XZ+ Diesel delivers exceptional torque and fuel efficiency. Its 1.5L diesel engine produces 260 Nm of torque, making highway drives effortless. Equipped with an 10.25-inch touchscreen with wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto.

The Hyundai Creta SX(O) is a premium mid-size SUV featuring Level 2 ADAS with 19 safety features. Its 1.5L turbo GDi engine produces 160 HP paired with a 7-speed DCT. Interior highlights include dual-zone climate control and a 10.25-inch digital cluster.

features: LED Headlamps|Rear AC Vents|Push Button Start
description: The Hyundai Creta EX is an excellent value proposition in the mid-size SUV segment. It offers a comfortable ride, spacious cabin, and essential features at a competitive price point.

The Maruti Brezza ZXi+ combines Suzuki's reliability with modern features. The K15C DualJet engine with mild-hybrid delivers excellent fuel efficiency. Features include a 9-inch SmartPlay Pro+ infotainment system and Suzuki Connect telematics.

The Mahindra XUV700 AX7 Luxury is a flagship 7-seater SUV with segment-first features. Its 2.2L mHawk diesel engine produces a massive 185 HP and 420 Nm. ADAS suite includes adaptive cruise control, lane keep assist, and forward collision warning.

The Mahindra Thar LX is India's most iconic off-roader now with modern comforts. Features a 2.2L mHawk diesel engine, 4x4 with shift-on-fly, and mechanical locking differential. Perfect for weekend adventures and daily commuting alike.

The Kia Seltos HTX+ offers a premium experience with its 1.5L Turbo GDi engine producing 160 HP. Features include a 10.25-inch touchscreen with OTA updates, 8-speaker Bose sound system, and Kia Connect with 70+ connected car features.

The Grand Vitara Alpha+ Hybrid is India's most fuel-efficient SUV at 27.97 kmpl. Toyota's strong hybrid system allows pure EV driving in city conditions. Features include a panoramic sunroof, head-up display, and 360-degree camera.

The Tata Harrier Fearless+ Dark Edition is a commanding presence on the road. Its 2.0L Kryotec diesel engine produces 170 HP with a smooth 6-speed AT. ADAS features, JBL 10-speaker audio, and a 12.3-inch floating touchscreen complete the package.
